name: Blacula
overview: This game has been found recorded on a Microhobby Seleccion tape. It has been able to be preserved as TZX and the game is not finished, but it is very playable. There are no references to it, but from some information we have obtained it seems that it is the work of Angel Jiménez (Macedo), one of the programmers of the game "Capitan Sevilla" (Captain S).
